posts.content:
I am selling a couple of rear hatches, this one has been repaired with a new Skin, filled and primed ready for flatting and final paint as you can see its in very good order and ready to finish

Happy to take to VolksWorld (Saturday) or collect from Farnborough Hants, or I might be able to ship it but would need to check cost after packaging.

Asking Â£200
